question: What is the primary obligation of REALTORS® when representing a buyer, seller, landlord, tenant, or other client as an agent?

options.text: To ensure the client receives the best financial deal
To protect and promote the interests of their client
To prioritize their own interests in the transaction
To maintain confidentiality at all times
To provide legal advice to the client

question: What is required of REALTORS® when advertising unlisted property in which they have an ownership interest?

options.text: Disclose their status as both owners/landlords and as REALTORS® or real estate licensees
Only disclose their status as REALTORS®
Obtain written consent from the National Association of Realtors
